trans-unit.source: Enables upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> projects to run in [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].
When a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], it is converted to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.
Declarations are added to your project: one for the `WebClass` and one for each `WebItem` and `Template` in the `WebClass` project.
A `Page_Load` event procedure is added to the project.

This creates first a `WebClass` object and then <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> objects for each `WebItem` and `Template` associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project.
Finally, in the `Page_Load` event procedure, you will see a call to the `WebClass` Compatibility runtime: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass.ProcessEvents%2A>.
This enables the runtime to render the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> specified in the Request URL.
This code is the only new code added to your upgraded project and serves only to emulate the underlying behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` runtime.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass"></xref> class.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.

A <xref:System.String> that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property for the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> object.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the file name for the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> object.

A <xref:System.String> that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""></xref> property for the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> object.
Gets the name that is used in code to identify a <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> object.
Read-only.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the name for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebClass" name="WebClass" href=""></xref> object.
Gets or sets another <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> object in the current <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass"></xref> object.
Used to shift processing from one <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> to another during a single request.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.
A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> object.
Renders a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass"></xref>.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.
An <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object.
Gets or sets a parameter that is appended to the end of any URL that is generated by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass.URLFor*> method.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the parameter that will be appended.

Specifies the URL that the system must have to reference a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass"></xref><xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> in the browser.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.
A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> object for which you want to generate a URL and raise an event.
Optional.
A <xref:System.String> that refers to an event in the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref>.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the URL.

Specifies the URL that the system must have to reference a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass"></xref><xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> in the browser.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref> object for which you want to generate a URL and raise an event.
Optional.
A <xref:System.String> that refers to an event in the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem"></xref>.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the URL.
